# TestCoin Mart

Website: https://testcoinmart.top
Brand: TestCoin Mart
Tagline: Buy testnet coins. Ship in minutes.

## Canonical agent entrypoints
- Skills index: https://testcoinmart.top/v1/skills
- Marketplace default skill: https://testcoinmart.top/v1/skills/get-test-faucet
- Faucet-first skill: https://testcoinmart.top/v1/skills/faucet-first
- Purchase skill: https://testcoinmart.top/v1/skills/buy
- OpenAPI: https://testcoinmart.top/v1/skills/openapi.yaml

## Public purchase API
- List products: GET https://testcoinmart.top/v1/products
- Create order: POST https://testcoinmart.top/v1/orders
- Query order: GET https://testcoinmart.top/v1/orders/{order_id}

## Purchase constraints for agents
1. Use exact amount from paymentOptions.
2. Use designated chain/token/address for the order.
3. Treat repeated payment as manual-review risk.
4. Poll every 3-5 seconds until:
   - FULFILLED
   - FULFILL_FAILED_MANUAL
   - EXPIRED

## Human-readable docs
- Skills guide: https://testcoinmart.top/skills
- Faucet-first guide: https://testcoinmart.top/guides/faucet-first
